text: Kenduapada railway station is a railway station on the East Coast Railway network in the state of Odisha, India. It serves Kenduapada village. Its code is KED. It has four platforms. Passenger, MEMU, Express trains halt at Kenduapada railway station. ==Major Trains== * East Coast Express ==References== ==See also== * Bhadrak district Category:Railway stations in Bhadrak district Category:Khurda Road railway division
title: Kenduapada railway station
